Welcome to ReelsFX, where creativity meets technology to deliver exceptional animation videos, vanilla videos and personalized video solutions. We are a passionate team of innovators, storytellers, and visual artists dedicated to transforming your ideas into breathtaking visuals.

At ReelsFX, we believe every project is unique, just like the stories behind them. Whether you’re a social media marketing agency, a videographer, or an individual client, our mission is to make your vision come alive with stunning precision and creativity.We’re not just about creating videos; we’re about crafting visual stories that resonate. From the first concept to the final render, we ensure every frame embodies creativity, quality, and passion.
At ReelsFX, we don’t just make videos—we create experiences. Let’s make something extraordinary together.
We specialize in creating immersive 3D animations and dynamic visuals that bring your imagination to life.
We turn ordinary visuals into extraordinary creations with expert editing, adding cinematic magic to every frame.
We create standout reels and branded videos that boost your presence and leave a lasting impact.

Do you have any question request or comment? We’d love to hear from you! Fill out the form, and we will get right back to you.
PR, Press or Partnerships:
Wholesale Enquiries:
General Information
Welcome to ReelsFX. By accessing or using our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully before using our services.
ReelsFX offers animation, and social media content services. The scope, timeline, and pricing of each project will be agreed upon during the consultation phase and outlined in a formal agreement.
Provide clear and detailed requirements, including any specific content, branding, or creative elements.
Deliver necessary files, assets, or information promptly to ensure smooth project execution.
Approve drafts and revisions within the agreed timeline to avoid delays.
ReelsFX offers a limited number of revisions based on the project scope and selected package. Additional revisions may incur extra charges, which will be communicated in advance.
A deposit (percentage agreed upon) is required to initiate the project.
Final payment must be completed upon project delivery.
Payments are non-refundable once the project has commenced.
Final deliverables will be shared in agreed formats such as MP4, MOV, or others.
ReelsFX ensures timely delivery based on the project timeline; however, delays caused by unforeseen circumstances or client inaction are not the company’s responsibility.
ReelsFX retains the rights to use project deliverables for portfolio or marketing purposes unless otherwise agreed in writing.
Clients hold the rights to the final product upon full payment but cannot resell or redistribute without prior consent.
ReelsFX will not disclose any proprietary information or project details provided by the client to third parties without prior consent.
ReelsFX is not responsible for how the client uses the final product or any outcomes resulting from its use.
While we strive for error-free deliverables, clients must notify us of any errors within 7 days of delivery for rectification.
Cancellations must be made in writing.
Refunds are not available once significant work has been completed.
In the event of a cancellation, the client will be invoiced for work completed up to the cancellation date.
ReelsFX reserves the right to terminate services if the client breaches any terms or engages in unethical behavior
ReelsFX reserves the right to update or amend these terms and conditions at any time. Clients will be notified of significant changes.

For questions or concerns regarding these terms, please contact us at:
Email: info@reelsfx.com
Phone: 9559050095

At ReelsFX, we are committed to protecting your privacy and safeguarding your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the data you share with us. By using our services, you agree to the terms of this policy.
We collect different types of information to provide and improve our services.

When you place an order, sign up, or contact us, we may collect personal information, including your name, email, phone number, and billing details. If you provide business details while purchasing a video, we store this information for order fulfillment. Additionally, payment details required for transactions are processed securely through trusted third-party payment gateways.

To enhance user experience, we automatically collect usage data, including IP addresses, browser type, device information, and site interaction details. We also use cookies and tracking technologies to improve functionality, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

The information we collect helps us process and fulfill video orders, enhance our website and services, and improve customer experience. We use your data to communicate with you regarding orders, updates, and promotional offers. Additionally, we ensure website security, prevent fraudulent activities, and comply with legal obligations. Your data allows us to deliver a seamless, customized experience while keeping our platform secure and efficient.

At ReelsFX, we do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information. Payment processors securely handle transactions, while analytics providers help us track website performance and user experience. If required by law, we may also disclose your information to comply with legal or regulatory obligations.

We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse. However, no online platform is entirely risk-free, and we encourage users to take precautions when sharing sensitive information online. We continuously work on strengthening security measures to ensure your data remains safe.

As a user, you have the right to access, update, or delete your personal data stored with us. You can also opt out of receiving promotional emails by using the unsubscribe link provided in our communications. If you wish to disable cookies, you can do so through your browser settings. For data modification or deletion requests, please contact us at info@reelsfx.com.

Our website uses cookies to remember user preferences, analyze performance, and enhance usability. These cookies help us deliver a personalized experience and serve relevant advertisements based on browsing behavior. If you prefer, you can adjust your browser settings to disable cookies, though this may affect certain functionalities of our website.

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our services, regulations, or security practices. Any modifications will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this policy regularly to stay informed about how we protect your data.

If you have any questions, concerns, or requests regarding this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us:
Email: info@reelsfx.com
Phone: +919559050095
